titleStmt.title: A hue and cry after the reasons which were to have been given on Thursday September 18. 1679. to the Lieutenancy, by Sir T.P. and others.
titleStmt.author: T. P., Sir.
Player, Thomas, Sir, d. 1686.

notesStmt.note: BM attributes authorship to Sir Thomas Player; however, piece satirizes him.
Item at reel 747:32 identified as Wing P111 (number cancelled).
Reproductions of original in Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
